text: API KEY STORAGE: All API keys are stored in /Users/yourox/AI-Workspace/.env file with 600 permissions (owner only). REF API key is loaded from environment variable REF_API_KEY. Never store actual keys in memory - only reference their location. Keys should be rotated regularly and never committed to version control.

API KEY POLICY: All API keys including REF must be stored in .env file only. Load REF_API_KEY from environment variable in Claude Desktop config. Never store actual keys in memory - only store policies and references to their locations.
